name: The Flash in UE5
description:
Inspired by those amazing UE5 videos, I decided to create a casual The Flash experience (I needed a break from my other project, The Maze to think and relax).

This Tech Demo is just a showcase of the character himself; I would love to move him to The Matrix Awakens: An Unreal Engine 5 Experience city scene, though, I don't have the horsepower for it (yet).

If anyone wants to use this character setup to do so, I am more than happy to share the project file too!

The following content were used:

The Flash 3D Model

https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/the-flash-s4-obj-1c361808142e49cf96f6035bc60e507...

Lightning / Electricity VFX Pack

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/ba2c4d039e79412aa5881f97f...
